column4: what is this KVM, supposedly lets you run windows programs? does it work well?
i downloaded virtualbox... that wanted me to install a totally new windows image... bleh
man...
well, wine worked, kindof....
the only thing, other than diablo, that i tried to open, was alcohol.... but then alcohol wouldnt close lol
makes me wish i still had a windows98 cd, lol....
i heard u had to pay for cedega
so i didnt even mess with it
wine didnt seem to work with diablo, although "they" said it worked just fine on the website
you can't run it from your windows partition, you have to install it from scratch for it to work properly
no, you have to install diablo from scratch, you can't just play it from your windows partition
so i install diablo, through wine?
yeah, just run the setup off the disk through wine.
yeah
actually, sudo apt-get install wine
u know if it will work through battle.net?
as long as your CD-key is valid ;)
of course....
should work just fine, then
before i spend half an hour shuffling diablo disks... can i just copy the windows' dir of diablo to a folder on linux? and run it from there
fraid not, man.
